recipes.title: Haydari
recipes.method: Crush the garlic into a puree. Mash the feta cheese with a fork. Finely chop the dill. Put all the ingredients in a mixing bowl.After mixing it well with the help of a spoon or whisk, transfer it to the serving plate. Share it coldly with your loved ones.

recipes.title: Humus
recipes.method: Mix tahini, olive oil, cumin and salt in a bowl. Add the juice of the lemons as well. Finally, finely chop the garlic, add them and mix well.Blend with the tahini mixture you prepared in the food processor until you get a smooth consistency. If the food processor is struggling, add olive oil or water little by little to reach the desired consistency.

recipes.title: Greek Salad
recipes.method: Chop cheese, onions and tomatoes. mix all the ingredients. It's that simple.

recipes.title: Carrot Tarator
recipes.method: Grate the carrot and put it in a pan. Fry it with a little olive oil for 2-3 minutes on medium heat, until soft, and set aside to cool.Take yoghurt, strained yoghurt, cooled grated carrot, walnut kernels, olive oil, grated garlic and salt in a bowl and mix well. That's all.
